text: "Chiclete com banana" is a song written by Gordurinha and Almira Castilho and recorded in 1959 by Jackson do Pandeiro, who popularized the song. The title means "chewing gum and banana," which refers to American and Brazilian music. Since 1959, the song has been re-recorded by Gilberto Gil,"Gilberto Gil Chiclete com Banana". Tania Maria,"Tania Maria - Chiclete com Banana". and others. It is thought to be among the first songs composed in the style of samba rock. ==References== ==External links== * Information on Gordurinha Category:1959 songs Category:Samba songs
title: Chiclete com Banana (song)
